message: I'm coming down to SF tomorrow for an interview, but in addition I really want to catch the Canucks game 7. I recognize that hockey isn't quite as popular in the states as in Canada so I'm unsure if I'll stumble upon a bar with the game on.
It's not crowded, has good food, and will change the channel of the nearest TV to whatever. On Sundays there's often several football games going on for different customers.
I tried a Yelp search and found http://www.yelp.com/biz/hockey-haven-san-francisco#query:bars%20hockey
I think most sports bars will change the channel to any game you like if you ask nicely... especially since I don't think there are any major US sporting events going on tomorrow
Just ask politely if they will change the channel. Most places will do that because they know you'll stay and drink...
